My Three Sons is an American sitcom. The series ran from 1960 to 1965 on ABC, 
and moved to CBS until its end on April 13, 1972. My Three Sons chronicles the 
life of widower and aeronautical engineer Steven Douglas (Fred MacMurray) ... 
To keep the emphasis on "three sons", a new son named Ernie was adopted.
